channel.title: Decoder on AesVoy
channel.description: Recent content in Decoder on AesVoy

item.title: Auto-Encoder
item.description: An autoencoder begins its journey by compressing input data into a lower dimension. It then endeavors to reconstruct the original input from this compressed representation. The crux of its functionality lies in minimizing the difference between the attempted recreation and the original input, known as the reconstruction error.
